description:
OC Normal Balance Shampoo with Organic Aloe Vera & Ginseng. Cleanse & revitalise your hair. With plant-based ingredients and free from paraben and SLES.

Sustainable Australian Hair Care
Our NORMAL BALANCE Shampoo is formulated with natural plant based ingredients and botanical actives to care for your hair, naturally. Enriched with Certified Organic Aloe Vera and Ginseng to bring balance while helping to boost vitality and hydration with every wash.Â 

No Parabens.
No SLES & ALS.
No Propylene Glycol.
No Triclosan.
No EDTA.
No Harsh Detergents.
No Petrochemical Cleansers.
No Mineral Oils.
name: Oc Naturals Shampoo Normal Balance 400mL
